metadata_entries.title: Workshop #2: Content Framework
metadata_entries.summary: This document outlines and defines content types for an internal workshop, providing key purposes, success metrics, and representative examples. It covers content profiles from deep analysis to quick takes and establishes measurable outcome criteria. The structure aims to clarify and standardize content ideation for the team's future outputs.
key_points: Define each content type with clarity.
List purposes, main elements, and explicit success criteria.
Focus on measurable completion and engagement rates.

data_points.context: Completion rate success metric for deep analysis
Minutes average time spent on deep analysis
Teams studied in sample deep analysis example

metadata_entries.data_density_justification: Contains several metrics and structured content types, but as an outline not exhaustive.
metadata_entries.author: N/A
content_structure: Subtypes: Deep Analysis, Quick Takes, etc.
missing_fields_or_ambiguity: Creation date not explicit (using last modified)

metadata_entries.title: 03 Section Details
metadata_entries.summary: Provides detailed internal brainstorming on the specifics for each content section, emphasizing mission articulation, and structure for subsequent content categories. Focuses on critical foundational elements and personal opinions from contributors to ensure strategic focus.
key_points: Clarifies what should be in each core section.
Stresses the importance of a clear mission.
metadata_entries.data_density_justification: Specific, structured, but outline format limits volume.
metadata_entries.author: N/A
metadata_entries.tone: direct, critical, informal in moderator notes
missing_fields_or_ambiguity: Creation date not explicit (using last modified)

metadata_entries.title: 10 Quality Standards
metadata_entries.summary: Establishes technical, editorial, and testing quality standards for internal publication processes, emphasizing measurable and transparent validation for all claims. Provides procedural checklists and example quality criteria to ensure rigor.
key_points: Quality requires measurable criteria across all domains.
Technical and editorial accuracy grids provided.
Sample protocols for technical testing included.
metadata_entries.data_density_justification: Dense with requirements, procedures, and technical details.
metadata_entries.author: N/A
metadata_entries.content_completeness: Outline, but more detailed than others (procedural steps given)
missing_fields_or_ambiguity: Creation date not explicit (using last modified)

metadata_entries.title: 12 Ethics Corrections
metadata_entries.summary: Discusses editorial mechanisms for handling corrections and ethical standards across published content, specifying corrective transparency procedures and example formatting. It aims to institutionalize trustworthiness and accountability in edits.
key_points: Correction handling must match prominence of errors.
Corrections must be labeled and timestamped.
Original text should be visible but struck through.
metadata_entries.data_density_justification: Contains a procedural list and example, brief for topic.
metadata_entries.author: N/A
missing_fields_or_ambiguity: Creation date not explicit (using last modified)

metadata_entries.title: 04 Final Structure
metadata_entries.summary: Presents an agreed-upon, consensus-driven final outline for the internal content style guide 'VECTOR WAVES.' Details foundational components, including mission, principles, and structured sections for consistent future content creation processes.
key_points: Synthesizes group discussion into unified structure.
Identifies content guide elements: mission, anti-mission, and principles.
Provides high-level categorization for content output.

data_points.context: Version of the VECTOR WAVES STYLE GUIDE

metadata_entries.data_density_justification: Comprehensive for outline, but no full content.

content_structure: Sectional Breakdown: Foundation, Mission & Anti-Mission, Principles
